[[File:Pieter Hendrik Schoute, 1911.jpg|thumb|Pieter Hendrik Schoute]]
'''Pieter Hendrik Schoute''' (21 January 1846, [[Wormerveer]] – 18 April 1923, [[Groningen (city)|Groningen]]) was a [[Netherlands|Dutch]] [[mathematician]] known for his work on [[regular polytope]]s and [[Euclidean geometry]].

In 1886 he became member of the [[Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences]].<ref>{{cite web|author= |url=http://www.dwc.knaw.nl/biografie/pmknaw/?pagetype=authorDetail&aId=PE00002887 |title=Pieter Hendrik Schoute (1846 - 1913) |publisher=Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences |date= |accessdate=30 July 2015}}</ref>
